name: Bloody Pulp Fiction
storyline:
Deadland awaits Caleb as he is thrust into action once again by the determined Cabal who are stopping at nothing to kill, enslave, pillage, ravage, and bring forth unholy darkness in it's wake.
Caleb, now in the present, wants nothing more than to avoid the Cabal and forget any ties to Tchernobog, but the world is Decaying as the Remnants of the Cabal spread through out the globe like a Cancer.
summary: Bloody Pulp Fiction (also known as BPF) is a fan add-on for Blood with two new original episodes (the second in two separate parts) ranging from dilapidated carnivals, huge sea-faring ships, to old desert ghost towns long forgotten along Route 66. It was developed by Ryan "Wangho" Williams and RedFanatic with assistance from Diman (aka NoOne) of Alone in the Dark, first publicly announced on February 5, 2007 and finally released on May 19, 2009, with an updated version 1.2 following on June 13th. A remastered version is currently in the works by Wangho.
